Name: Chessers
About the game: Chessers is Chess but with a twist - when one of your pieces moves to the opponent's half of the board, it becomes a Checker! It features the rules of Chess but when fused with Checkers, it throws your strategy out the window. It's the blurst Chess variant out there.
